alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; North Bighorn Basin; Southeast Bighorn Basin; Southwest Bighorn Basin; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 05 at 1:34PM MDT until October 07 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 are possible. * WHERE...North Bighorn Basin, Southwest Bighorn Basin, Southeast Bighorn Basin, Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin, Lander Foothills, Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...From late Friday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; North Bighorn Basin; Southeast Bighorn Basin; Southwest Bighorn Basin; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin
